leaseOffer.disclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2020 BMW 230i Coupe models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through June 01, 2020, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $389 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $32,360 (MSRP of $38,895, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $2,685 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $1,350 and $2,500 Lease Credit).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $2,685 down payment, $389 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license, registration and dealer fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $20,614.

Offer valid through June 01, 2020 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

Monthly lease payments of $1,039 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $82,185 (MSRP of $89,995, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $5,035 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $2,775).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $5,035 down payment, $1,039 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.
